metadata.title: CVE-2021-4145 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference issue was found in the block mirror layer ofQEMU in versions prior to 6.2.0. The `self` pointer is dereferenced inmirror_wait_on_conflicts() without ensuring that it's not NULL. A maliciousunprivileged user within the guest could use this flaw to crash the QEMUprocess on the host when writing data reaches the threshold of mirroringnode.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
